ComicInfo.Penciller: Ariel Olivetti,Jim Keegan,Ruth Keegan,Jim Keegan,Ruth Keegan,Ariel Olivetti
ComicInfo.Series: Conan and the People of the Black Circle
ComicInfo.Summary:
Desperate soldiers, ruthless mercenaries, vengeance-crazed tribesmen, and evil sorcerers—they’re all out for Conan’s blood! After the Black Seers of Yimsha seize Queen Yasmina and withdraw to their mountain fortress, will the Cimmerian be able to reclaim the woman that he himself has taken hostage?
From Fred Van Lente and Ariel Olivetti, the celebrated team behind Hercules and Hulk!
Conan like you’ve never seen him—fully painted by Olivetti!
With The Legend of Conan announced for 2014, Dark Horse’s Conan is essential reading!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/conan-and-the-people-of-the-black-circle-3/4000-436175/
